mapper.sql: ID, TYPE, STYLE, NEW_TITLE, NEW_CATAGORY, NEW_SOURCE, PUBLISH_AT, PUBLISH_BY, CREATE_AT
mapper.insert: insert into RES_NEWS (ID, TYPE, STYLE, NEW_TITLE, NEW_CATAGORY, NEW_SOURCE, PUBLISH_AT, PUBLISH_BY, CREATE_AT, NEW_BODY, NEW_PICTURE) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newCatagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{newSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{publishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{newBody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{newPicture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

mapper.update:
update RES_NEWS
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STYLE = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_TITLE = #{newTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_CATAGORY = #{newCatagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEW_SOURCE = #{newSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PUBLISH_AT = #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PUBLISH_BY = #{publishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NEW_BODY = #{newBody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
NEW_PICTURE = #{newPicture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update RES_NEWS set TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYLE = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_TITLE = #{newTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_CATAGORY = #{newCatagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_SOURCE = #{newSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISH_AT = #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PUBLISH_BY = #{publishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, NEW_BODY = #{newBody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, NEW_PICTURE = #{newPicture,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update RES_NEWS set TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STYLE = #{style,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_TITLE = #{newTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_CATAGORY = #{newCatagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEW_SOURCE = #{newSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PUBLISH_AT = #{publishAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PUBLISH_BY = #{publishBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select
,
from RES_NEWS
1=1
AND INSTR(TYPE,#{type})>0
AND INSTR(NEW_TITLE,#{newTitle})>0
AND INSTR(NEW_CATAGORY,#{newCatagory})>0
AND INSTR(PUBLISH_BY,#{publishBy})>0
AND PUBLISH_AT BETWEEN #{publishAt_startAt} AND #{publishAt_endAt}
ORDER BY ${orderColumnNameAndDir}
limit #{pageNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{pageSize,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select count(ID) from RES_NEWS
1=1
AND INSTR(TYPE,#{type})>0
AND INSTR(NEW_TITLE,#{newTitle})>0
AND INSTR(NEW_CATAGORY,#{newCatagory})>0
AND INSTR(PUBLISH_BY,#{publishBy})>0
AND PUBLISH_AT BETWEEN #{publishAt_startAt} AND #{publishAt_endAt}
